text: Take bala hala, ‘prasadatite prabesa kara.’ Atahpara yakhana se seta dekhala takhana se setake eka gabhira jalasaya mane karala ebam se tara payera gocha duto anabrta karala. Sula'imana balalena, eta to sbaccha sphatika mandita prasada. Se'i nari balala, ‘he amara raba! Ami to nijera prati yuluma karechilama [1], ara ami sula'imanera sathe srstikulera raba allah‌ra kache atmasamarpana karachi.’
